Class BaseSdkLogger

java.lang.Object
com.sportradar.livedata.sdk.common.classes.BaseSdkLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileSdkLogger
public abstract class BaseSdkLogger extends Object
Represents a base class for all SDK loggers.
